roi_improvements: Increase reward distribution by 15% to encourage more participants to join contests
Optimize contest duration to reduce average time spent by 20% and increase engagement
Implement A/B testing to improve average completion rate by 12% and enhance overall campaign effectiveness
feature_suggestions: Introduce a leaderboard to foster competition and increase engagement by 10%
Develop a referral program to encourage participants to invite friends and increase joins by 15%
Create a contest calendar to improve visibility and encourage participants to plan ahead
engagement_strategies: Personalize contest notifications to increase opens and clicks by 8%
Offer exclusive rewards to loyal participants to increase retention by 12%
Host webinars or workshops to educate participants on contest strategies and increase engagement by 10%
reward_and_incentive_tips: Offer a mix of monetary and non-monetary rewards to cater to different participant preferences
Create a reward tier system to incentivize participants to complete more contests
Collaborate with brands to offer exclusive rewards and increase participant interest
